website_summaries.verdict: Not the best choice for more than 2 players; otherwise it's a decent JOOLA set with a case that's even more impressive than the paddles and balls.
pros: Stands out for the impressive case that has a thick foam insert that provides extra protection for balls and paddles
Comes with 2 nicely constructed paddles and 18 well-made, responsive balls
cons: A few players gripe about the lack of spin produced by the paddles
Some quality control issues have been reported – missing paddles, broken balls upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: ( so disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: why did i buy these :( so disappointed...I wanted to get a mid level entry set for my father in-law but these paddles are horrible... i'm not a pro, but having decent equipment makes the game more enjoyable, these are a complete flop. I let the ball drop freely on the paddle and ball does not bounce back up, its as if it was dropped on a tar pit ( i probably got bounces of the paddle )... so so sad, i'm probably going to buy some entry level butterfly's or wait for a friend to go to China
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: and in good condition!
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my mom, and she loves it! She has a bunch of grand kids, and this helps keep a couple of the paddles out of the reach of little ones, and in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: OSUBHJ

customer_reviews.title: the are pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: After using these paddles a few times, the are pretty nice for the price. Decent case, decent balls. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice all-in-one kit for the average player who wants decent quality; can't go wrong for the price when on sale
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend as a gift and he seems to like it. I haven't asked him about it recently but I did get a chance to test a paddle out when it was new and it seems like a good average style in terms of quality and weight. Good balls, too. Very nice case. A good choice for average players looking for an all-in-one kit, especially when it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great ball bounce I bought to go with my new table tennis.  I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the paddles yet so I can't tell you about them, but they do look very good. The balls are great. I will buy the same brand if I ever need more in the future. The balls make a huge difference when you play. The balls that came with my Hathaway Victory Professional Table Tennis were not good and I used these instead off of a suggestion from another poster. It was a great suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Bright_Idea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case, after a week or so the padding ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case, after a week or so the padding started to peel, hoping it is a defect- sending it back- but the ball quality is superb, and the paddle felt good- I hope the new one lasts
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of racquets and case.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old nephew has become a pretty good table tennis player. He is entering some small school tournaments and doing well. This is a nice set of racquets and a travel case for him. The racquets have a sticky foam surface which gives him some grip and spin on the ball and a lot of control.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Adam

customer_reviews.title: This set is a good set to have for recreational players such as myself
customer_reviews.text: This set is a good set to have for recreational players such as myself. The paddles are as you would expect. They work just fine for what I use them for. The joola balls that come with it are somewhat easily breakable but it could be us. Overall, I love both the paddles and the table tennis balls.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set and excellent value. Was using the old cheap paddles that come with any basic set. The JOOLA paddles have improved both mine and my son's game (I would classify us as intermediate players) significantly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: but the kids like them. Better than the impending "new" non-celluloid ball
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price. Not a fan of the orange ball, but the kids like them. Better than the impending "new" non-celluloid ball.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The rubber on the paddle started to peel away shortly ...
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on the paddle started to peel away shortly after receiving and only a few games played. Otherwise the case, balls & case were of quality I expected. The paddles are slow and do appear to have decent spin control.
customer_reviews.author: Kreuser

customer_reviews.title: Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: was a nice plastic, protective case with 18 ping pong balls...NO Paddles Included. Not as advertised. I now have plenty of balls, but no way to play!!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA L SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are good rackets and it's great to have so many spare balls. The reusable travel case is also very handy. Seems like a good set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: The Unknown Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The rackets are much nicer than you'd expect and they don't have that horrible graphic on the paddle. It's red and black as you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Nick J.

customer_reviews.title: Problem with packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine but something must have gone wrong with packaging it because the tour case was broken and a couple of balls were squashed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for intermediate players, and perhaps for some beginners who are getting serious. Good quality. like it.
customer_reviews.author: school play

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great set comes in a convenient carry case and protects well.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Good deal! Awesome paddles and balls!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal! Awesome paddles and balls! So good I ordered a second set. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Grace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set...sent as gift and , well hit it out of the park!
customer_reviews.author: Brad K

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a really nice set of ping pong paddles and balls
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a table that didn't come with paddles so we purchased this set. The racquets are nice and feel good in the grip. The balls are good and not cheap. Very nice set for beginner to mid experience players. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: funwheel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set! Paddles are nice along with balls! Prime got it to me fast!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. It was much lesser priced than Dicks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It was much lesser priced than Dicks sports. The quality of the wood and the adhesive is better than Stiga ones priced the same.
customer_reviews.author: Informed shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 star ping pong balls and great paddles
customer_reviews.text: I dont see how you can beat $40 for this, I probably would of paid twice that. Great 3 star ping pong balls and great paddles. I am really surprised at how much control these things give you. Def recommended
customer_reviews.author: Andreo

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law loves it. He says that the thickness and firmness of it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I'm more of a casual player so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I'm more of a casual player so didn't want to spend too much but wanted something better than the cheap paddles, so this fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cleman Chan

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good starter kit should you buy a new ping-pong table
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good starter kit should you buy a new ping-pong table. These balls seem almost indestructible, as we had them swatted by our ceiling fan at high speed and just keep on going. And the two paddles are really well-made with a great surface that allows you to obtain great spin on the ball. For the price, this is a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: klaatu

customer_reviews.title: Got the runs?
customer_reviews.text: I'm playing ping pong as good as the Asian man with diarrhea on the box!
customer_reviews.author: Herdnerfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table tennis set
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely not an expert when it comes to table tennis, but I enjoy playing it at my gym sometimes. I wanted my own paddles and balls, so I got the Joola set. I like that the case makes it easy to carry around everything you need, and this way you are less likely to lose a ball. The paddles are black on one side, red on the other, and cushioned. The whole set seems to be of good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: WLJ

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Pro Pong set
customer_reviews.text: 18 terrific balls contained in a snap case with two exceptional paddles. The paddle wood is nice to the touch and the weight is perfect, the striking surface is slightly tacky so you can angle the ball on impact. The balls bounce true and are perfectly smooth and balanced for accurate placement during competition. Overall a great set, the snaps on the case are little tricky to close but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I really have no complaint so I gave 5 stars. Balls are pretty good. Paddles are quite good. Not all will like the padded slightly heavier paddle but after one session I really enjoyed it and played quite well. I am intermediate, but not expert.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: lightning deal. worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles for the money. I paid $40 in a lightning deal. Great for someone taking themselves more seriously in pong to see quality materials for spin etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are above average and the balls are 3 star balls. The carrying case is cool and it was a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Bailiff

product_meta.title: JOOLA Tour Competition Carrying Case - Ping Pong Paddle Set Includes 2 ITTF APPROVED Python Table Tennis Paddles & 18 40mm 3 Star Tournament Ping Pong Balls - High Density Case with EVA Foam Lining
product_meta.description: The JOOLA Tour Competition Case provides every player with a tool for comfortably carrying and storing essential ping-pong equipment. The quality, durable foam-lined case can store a total of 18 balls and two (2) rackets. The Easy-Open Double Snap Lock System allows you to securely close the case keeping the contents clean, dry, and safe. Included in this protective case are two (2) Beginner-Level JOOLA Python Bats and 18 JOOLA 3-Star, 40+mm Orange Competition Table Tennis Balls. Start playing like a champion with equipment developed for champions! JOOLA is a proud sponsor of the US National Team.
feature_bullets: JOOLA - AN OLYMPIC TABLE TENNIS BRAND TRUSTED FOR 60+ YEARS: Launched in the 1950s, JOOLA has been the proud sponsor of the biggest tournaments in the world, Including the Olympics, World Championships, and US Open. Equipment designed for all levels.

PORTABLE STORAGE CASE: This durable, high-density EVA foam-lined protective ping pong case stores up to 18 balls (included) and 2 ping pong paddles (included). It features an easy-open, double snap lock system to keep contents safe, clean and dry.

MASTER THE BASICS: The JOOLA Python preassembled, International Table Tennis Federation (ITTF) approved ping-pong racquet is designed for beginners seeking to improve skills, such as learning to control the ball with a variety of key racket strokes.

ITTF REGULATION SIZE PING PONG BALLS: Manufactured to withstand advanced competition;  18 40+mm, 3-Star Orange Table Tennis Balls are ideal for serving your first ace or hitting the game winner past your opponent as a pro or in the family game room.

INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PLAY: This storage case of rackets and balls will work indoors or outdoors. The quality ensures the entire kit of paddles and balls can be used by kids and adults. Great gift for someone who already owns a JOOLA ping pong table.
